title: midday_sunlight_condition_maimeefarm
summary: Image records daylight and sunlight conditions at MaMeeFarm during midday.
description: Image captures visible sunlight, sky condition, and surrounding vegetation at MaMeeFarm. No instruments used. Record reflects ambient light condition at capture time.
